actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the retention of Army, Naval, and Air Force Reserve psychologists in an active status after attainment of an age that would otherwise require separation.

summary.text: Authorizes the retention of Army, Naval, and Air Force Reserve psychologists in an active status after attainment of an age that would otherwise require separation.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to authorize the retention of Army, Naval, and Air Force Reserve psychologists in an active status after attainment of an age that would otherwise require separation.
